EmailTemplate.name: 25/06/2014 KS2 Prize Giving
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation to KS2 Prize Giving
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
British International School Kuala Lumpur Chartered By The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
You are invited to attend BSKL's Key Stage 2 Prize Giving on Friday, 11th July 2014 at 8.15am - 9.30am at the Secondary Theatre. Our guest speaker is Mr Giles Duley, an award-winning war photojournalist. Canap√©s will be served after prize giving by the pool side.
Please RSVP by 27th June 2014 via the online form in the link below.
Online RSVP form (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1AV1O20aqrezYM2aYA11zOlbOpa7F_AItUpqP84cnGyc/viewform)
Invitation to KS2 Prize Giving (https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B57vMviVDx-xWWFaUWlFc0xiNHc/edit?usp=sharing)
Kind regards,
Admin Team British International School Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
_________________________________________________________ Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona - Marbella
